original_text: They will not agree together. The father will be against his son and the son will be against his father. The mother will be against her daughter and the daughter will be against her mother. The mother will be against her son's wife. And the son's wife will be against her husband's mother.’
korean_text: 아버지가 아들과, 아들이 아버지와, 어머니가 딸과, 딸이 어머니와, 시어머니가 며느리와, 며느리가 시어머니와 분쟁하리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: The father will be against his son
and the son will be against his father.
The mother will be against her daughter
and the daughter will be against her mother.
The mother will be against her son's wife.
And the son's wife will be against her husband's mother.
